survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate the effectiveness and satisfaction levels of remote onboarding processes for new employees in various organizations.

questions.question_text: How long ago did you complete your remote onboarding process?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for this question to ensure clarity and ease of response.

script.question_text: How long ago did you complete your remote onboarding process?

questions.question_text: Which of the following onboarding resources were provided to you? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice checkbox format to allow multiple selections. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional inputs.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE), include an open-text field for 'Other' option.

script.question_text: Which of the following onboarding resources were provided to you? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied were you with the clarity of instructions provided during your remote onboarding?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for this question to measure satisfaction levels accurately.

script.question_text: How satisfied were you with the clarity of instructions provided during your remote onboarding?

questions.question_text: What challenges did you face during your remote onboarding process? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice checkbox format with an 'Other' option for additional challenges not listed.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE), include an open-text field for 'Other' option.

script.question_text: What challenges did you face during your remote onboarding process? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How would you rate the overall effectiveness of your remote onboarding experience?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for this question to gather an overall rating.

script.question_text: How would you rate the overall effectiveness of your remote onboarding experience?

questions.question_text: Which of the following would have improved your remote onboarding experience? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice checkbox format with an 'Other' option for additional suggestions.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE), include an open-text field for 'Other' option.

script.question_text: Which of the following would have improved your remote onboarding experience? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How long did it take for you to feel fully integrated into your team after onboarding?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for this question to measure integration time.

script.question_text: How long did it take for you to feel fully integrated into your team after onboarding?

questions.question_text: Did you receive adequate support from your manager during the remote onboarding process?
answer_options: I did not interact with my manager during onboarding
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for this question to assess managerial support.

script.question_text: Did you receive adequate support from your manager during the remote onboarding process?
answer_options: I did not interact with my manager during onboarding

questions.question_text: What was the most helpful aspect of your remote onboarding experience?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-ended text field to allow respondents to provide detailed feedback.

script.question_text: What was the most helpful aspect of your remote onboarding experience?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend your organization's remote onboarding process to others?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for this question to gauge overall recommendation likelihood.

script.question_text: Would you recommend your organization's remote onboarding process to others?
